# Jenny and the Generators

## Intro

Use your Entity Framework Model to automatically generate source code

Thereâ€™s a lot of information in your database schema and a computer program is capable of using that to do some of the coding for you, while complying with architecture and design decisions.

Please see [https://jennygen.com](https://jennygen.com)
